body.name: Pipishell UL Listed Tilt TV Wall Mount Bracket Low Profile for Most 37-75 Inch LED LCD OLED Plasma Flat Curved TVs, Large Tilting Mount Fits 16"-24" Wood Studs Max VESA 600x400mm Holds up to 132lbs
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: Universal Compatibility - Our ultra strong UL listed TV mount fits most 37-75 inch TVs weighing up to 132lbs of major TV brands including Samsung, TCL, LG, Sony, Vizio, Panasonic, Thomson, Toshiba, Sharp, Philips etc. Solid and sturdy TV bracket fits VESA patterns from 200x100mm to 600x400mm. Can be mounted on 16" to 24" wood studs walls and concrete/brick walls conveniently. Please check the VESA pattern, weight, size of your TV before purchasing.

Improve Your Viewing Experience - Our wall mount TV bracket is fixed a mere 1.44“ to the wall to save space. Comes with a built-in tilt feature that allows you to tilt down 7° for anti-glaring providing confortable viewing experience.

Safe & Convenient - this tilting TV wall mount has an open wall plate design allowing it to be mounted directly over electrical outlets for a super clean installation. Breezily locks and releases your TV with pulling cords and the elegant panel edges prevent your TV from slipping off.

Easy Installation - comes with needed mounting hardware, a detailed English graphical installation guide that is actually useful and convenient which helps you to install this TV wall mount without any hassle. You can also check out our installation video in position 7 in our pictures.

Excellent Customer Service - our TV wall mount is constructed from high-quality steel materials, we are so confident in the construction, strength and durability of this wall bracket. And we provide 5-year friendly customer service making every purchase risk-free. Please feel free to contact us at anytime, rain or shine.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pipishell Large Tilting TV Wall Mount | Elevate Your TV Watching Experience Previous page Next page Elevate your viewing experience with Pipishell’s versatile tilting TV wall mount. The adjustable design allows you to tilt your TV down by 7° to reduce glare for optimal viewing. The sleek and low-profile TV mount can help to create a clean and modern look that blends well with any room décor.
Previous page Next page 1 Check before Purchase 2 1 TV Size and TV Weight 3 2 TV VESA 4 3 TV Cable Outlet 5 4 Wall Type

Step1- Attach TV Bracket to TV Note: Don't use electric drill. Step 2- Attach Wall Plate to the Wall Note: This TV wall mount fits for use in wood stud and solid concrete wall. DO NOT install into drywall alone. Step 3- Hang TV on the Wall Plate

Certified for Incredible Strength Our tilting TV mount has been UL certified for exceptional strength. With a weight capacity of 132 lbs, it has been tested to hold four times the advertised weight rating without bending or cracking, ensuring maximum security for your equipment
Previous page Next page 1 Anti-Drop Edges 2 Handy Pull cords 3 Strong security lock

TV campatible Fits 37 to 75 inch flat or curved LED OLED QLEKD 4K TVs weight up to 132lbs / 60kg, Compatible with SAMSUNG/LG/SONY/Hisense/VIZIO/TCL/SHARP/Toshiba/Panasonic/philips/SKYWORTH and more VESA mounting hole patterns 200x100mm/200x200mm/300X200mm/300x300mm/300x400mm/400x200mm/400x300mm/400X400mm/500x300/600x200/600x400 ( In inches: 8"x4"/8"x8"/12"x8"/12"x12"/16"x8"/16"x12"/16"x16"/20"x12"/24"x8"/24"x16") Tilt range 7 degrees backward Distance to wall 1.44 inch low profile Wall type 16/24 inch wood stud wall, concrete wall, brick walls, DO NOT INSTALL ON DRYWALL ALONE. Package includes: 1x TV wall mount / 1x Standard mounting hardware /1x 3-Axis magnetic bubble level / 5x Cable ties / 1x User manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy peasy to install and mount, and very sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I wish I had been brave enough to try a TV wall mount years ago. Frees up so much space in the room. I installed this by myself, a wimpy armed woman ;-). Once you are confident about the centerpoint of your studs (don’t guess, use a stud finder and mark the edges and center), and how far apart they are, it is super simple to mount. Mine were 16 inches on center, so I did not need the extra bracket piece. The only thing I would’ve done differently, drill the top two pilot holes first. Then mount the bracket and level it. Then drill the bottom two pilot holes and screw in the last two lag bolts/screws. The directions may have said that, but of course, I hardly read them, lol. The bracket is more than sturdy enough to support our TV. I have a 55” TCL Brand Roku TV from Costco. I’m guessing it doesn’t weigh more than 40 pounds. I was able to install the bracket and mount the television without any assistance from the hubby. Other than borrowing his tools. I did not use the feature where I can tilt the TV. Our room is fairly small, it is an office, so really didn’t need the tilt feature I tucked the release cords behind the TV by loosely tying them together to shorten them. I will be getting a cable hider for the TV power cord. Probably a white one, since my walls are pale yellow. Buy this, worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality Bracket
reviews.reviewText: The bracket was easy to install, but does require drilling holes to attach the bracket to the the wall. A level was included to help keeping the bracket horizontal. A stud finder, not furnished, is also required to install it in a frame wall. The basic frame (wall portion) is in two parts, the smaller may or may not be needed to accomodate the stud spacing on a frame wall. It attaches to the larger section with two screws easily. A good quality part for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been wanting to mount my TV for awhile, but was nervous about doing it since I had no clue where to start. I finally bought the mount just to see if I could do it. And it was so easy! It takes so muscles to screw everything but it went great. I did have some help putting the TV up. It's sturdy so it's not going anywhere and looks great! Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars EAsy to Install - except for tilt
reviews.reviewText: Installation went smoothly till I had to adjust the tilt of the TV. I actually had to remove the TV from the wall and adjust the tilt before reinstalling. There is no easy way to adjust the tilt while the TV is hanging on the wall mount. The adjustment requires a screwdriver and a wrench to hold the nut - and there are two on each TV bracket (you can only reach one while the TV is on the wall). I got it close enough for now, and hopefully the adjustment is done infrequently - but still it was a surprise after mounting close to a dozen TVs to encounter such a difficult adjustment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very great! Great and affordable purchase!
reviews.reviewText: The best and easiest install ever! Even comes with accessories you would need to install!!! Definitely recommend! As a tip just remember to attach your cords before mounting tv to wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to use and great quality. Simple design does wonders. Instructions meh but pretty straightforward.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top-Notch Performance, Unbeatable Value!
reviews.reviewText: The Pipishell UL Listed Tilt TV Wall Mount Bracket has been a game-changer! Its exceptional performance not only rivals but surpasses the options found in big box stores, all at a much more affordable price.This wall mount's reliability in securely holding my TV is outstanding, and the savings compared to other outlets are substantial. Its sturdy build and ability to handle the weight of the TV without compromise make it a smart investment.For anyone in search of a reliable, cost-effective TV wall mount that delivers on both quality and savings, the Pipishell UL Listed Tilt TV Wall Mount Bracket is the ideal choice. Its top-notch performance at a fraction of the cost is a winning combination!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great mount but beware if your tv is over 50” there is a strange add on extension that you have to bolt together the two plates. The bigger plate looks like it supports up to 50”. Great mount though. Even comes with a cool lever lll
Mount was easy to install came with all the parts necessary and extras for other wall types. I was able to mount right into wood studs. Feels very strong and holds 50 inch TV perfectly.

Comes with a wide range of bolts, screws and spacers and includes a Level (real bonus). Instructions clearly explain what to do and how for every step including when to get help. Spring loaded latches allow for easy placing of the TV on the bracket. Everything you need, highly recommended.

Perfect for a low-profile hanging TV. Our last TV mount sagged with the weight of our TV, this mount has been a game changer! Cost effective and easy to hang. One star lost as there aren’t holes for cables in the center of the TV to escape through, was a bit of a challenge for cable management.
You receive all the materials in the package and it’s surprisingly sturdy. Always follow instructions is my only recommendation.
The mount was easy to install. It's worth the money and I would recommend it.
